title: Color Fun Fest 5K Selects Events.com to Power Event Registration and Management
text:
Simple-yet-sophisticated software seamlessly bridges gap between event organizers and event participants
San Diego, CA
Events.com, an event management platform that facilitates and enhances the experience of hosting and attending events, announced today that Color Fun Fest, the epic night color run sweeping the nation, has selected Events.com to power event registration and management for a series of 5K events nationwide.
Founded by Jamie Leibert, the Color Fun Fest is the only run in the nation that offers both a day and night run, along with a massive finish line festival on the same day. Color Fun Fest offers a three-in-one experience for all participants.
The Color Fun Fest is currently in 22 cities and has grown to over 175,000 participants since 2012.
“Since our inception in 2012, Color Fun Fest has always taken pride in being innovators in the family fun run industry. We are continually looking for ways to provide a great experience to our participants and we have found that it is a natural fit to partner with Events.com,” said Craig Crossley, Chief Operating Officer of Color Fun Fest. “We are proud to be ‘powered’ by Events.com and their impressive functionality, including a completely customizable interface, real-time registration tracking and a white-label mobile app.”
“Our team agrees that an epic event series like Color Fun Fest epitomizes our mission of connecting people with incredible experiences they love, one event at a time,” said Julie Zattolo, Director of Business Development at Events.com. “We are ecstatic that our cloud-based software will help illuminate the Color Fun Fest, along with the thousands of pounds of color that will shower runners.”
Color Fun Fest proudly benefits Just Care More, a nonprofit organization that uses activities centered on extreme sports to improve the overall mentality and outlook for underprivileged children during a summer camp.
ABOUT COLOR FUN FEST 5K
Founded in 2012, Color Fun Fest pioneered the first night-time color run. Combining two of the most EPIC festivals in the world, Color Fun Fest brings the Holi Festival and the electronic dance movement together. As day transforms into night and the dust settles from our day color run, the strongest black lights in the world transition our day color run into a nighttime 5K color run festival called Color Fun Fest. For more information, please visit http://www.colorfunfest5k.com .
ABOUT EVENTS.COM
Events.com is a leading online marketplace uniting event organizers and event participants in a single place. Its cloud-based application bridges the gap between event organizers and event goers, giving the event ecosystem an improved solution to planning and finding events. Events.com has over 75 employees with headquarters in San Diego and an office in Ottawa, Canada. To learn more about Events.com, please visit http://www.events.com .
